updates.title: Critical Security Patch
updates.description: A critical security vulnerability was identified in the system. This patch addresses it with immediate effect.

updates.title: Bug Fix Release
updates.description: This release fixes minor bugs reported in the previous version. No significant changes in functionality.

updates.title: Feature Enhancement
updates.description: New features have been added to enhance user experience, including improved navigation and better performance.

updates.title: Server Downtime
updates.description: Scheduled server maintenance will occur between 1 AM and 4 AM. Services may be disrupted during this period.

updates.title: New Security Features
updates.description: Introduced new multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users to enhance account security.

updates.title: Data Backup Improvements
updates.description: Improved data backup system to ensure faster recovery and better data protection in case of failures.

updates.title: Mobile App Update
updates.description: A new version of the mobile app is now available with bug fixes and performance improvements.
